Background check MANDA TORY

Basic Qualifications

4+ years of experience with creating CI/CD pipelines for Application Deployments

Must have implemented DevOps practices/tools in areas such as Continuous Integration, Release automation, Metrics Tracking on the Azure Platform

Strong experience with Gitlab, Bitbucket Server, Artifactory, Jenkins

Strong experience working with Database Technologies: MongoDB, PostgresSQL (Azure CosmosDB)

Experience with Cloud Environments such as Azure or AWS - Specifically deploying (Java, SpringBoot, NodeJS) Applications on Cloud

Application troubleshooting experience with Linux Operating Systems

Knowledge about Blue/Green, Canary Deployments

Preferred Qualifications: (Good to have)

Created application performance dashboards on Azure, using Application Insights and automated alerts.

Ability to write Terraform scripts to build complete App services for large complex applications.

Experience with Secrets management using Azure Key Vault, HashiCorp Vault

Configuration Management (Ansible, Chef) experience is a plus
